answers.answer: What causes your elevated GGT?Diabetes, alcohol, obesity, liver or biliary tract disease?GGT can be lowered only with treating the cause, losing weight or dropping alcohol...as I know.

question: I have had a mri ctscan all normal my ggtp continues to be over 200 how can I lower it any drugs or food I can use, I need lower numbers for insuranceThis discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/234021.
title: ggtp
